<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Create an encoder</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/v2/encoders"}></MethodEndpoint>



Create a new encoder.

## Request

required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"A description of what this encoder does","type":"string","example":"OpenAI text embedding number of dimensions in the output embedding vector. If the encoder endpoint returns\nmore dimensions than specified here, the response will be truncated to this number of dimensions.\n","type":"integer","format":"int32","minimum":1,"example":1536}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"endpoint_url"} required={true} schemaName={"uri"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The URL of the OpenAI-compatible embedding endpoint","type":"string","format":"uri","example":"https://api.openai.com/v1/embeddings"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"model"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The model name to use for embeddings","type":"string","example":"text-embedding-ada-002"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><strong>auth</strong><span style={{"opacity":"0.6"}}> object</span><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

Authentication configuration for an LLM

The encoder has been created

embedding.\n","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":768}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"description"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Indicates whether the default encoder is used when creating a corpus.","type":"boolean","example":true}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Indicates whether the encoder is enabled.","type":"boolean","example":true}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n
